## üîç Monitoring & Rollback Plan

### Success Metrics
- ‚úÖ All CI checks pass
- ‚úÖ Health endpoint responds normally  
- ‚úÖ Core user workflows function
- ‚úÖ No new errors in application logs

### Rollback Triggers
- ‚ùå CI failures that can't be quickly resolved
- ‚ùå Critical application functionality breaks
- ‚ùå Performance degradation >20%
- ‚ùå Security vulnerabilities introduced

### Rollback Process
1. Revert problematic commits immediately
2. Re-run validation script to confirm restoration
3. Create hotfix PR with working state
4. Schedule proper fix for next deployment cycle
